title: Char-Broil Hybrid 3-Burner Gas / Charcoal Grill
description:
A two-in-one convenient 3-burner gas grill that heats up quickly for every day meals and a traditional charcoal grill that infuses intense flavor for more sophisticated recipes.  

Model# 463770915

Learn more at http://charbroil.com

Find the perfect grill for you: http://findyourcharbroil.com/
Subscribe to our youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/charbroil
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/charbroil
Tweet us at: https://twitter.com/Charbroil

About the Char-Broil Hybrid 3-Burner Gas/Charcoal Grill.
Sometimes you want the best of both grilling worlds.

The cooking efficiency and convenience of gas and the flavor and smell you get from charcoal.

But you might not want or have the space for two grills.

Enter the Char-Broil Hybrid

A two in one convenient 3-burner gas grill that heats up quickly for every day meals and a traditional charcoal grill that infuses intense flavor for more sophisticated recipes.  
To unleash the embers simply remove the grates and heat tents, place the tray into the grill, add charcoal, and use the easy rotary ignitor to light up the three burners. You don't even need lighter fluid or a match. When the charcoal turns white hot, turn off the burners and you're all set for grilling.

At Char-Broil  we've been innovating outdoor cooking for over 65 years and are America’s top selling gas grill brand. Along the way we’ve listened to you and learned about the features you need to start grilling with confidence.
- Easy to clean Porcelain Coated Cast Iron Cooking Grates
- A lid mounted temperature gauge 
- Large side shelves
- A side burner
- And two wheels to make it easy to move around.

The Char-Broil Hybrid delivers all the features you need to bring the flavor to your next cookout. 

So Live it Up and get one for yourself today.
